amendment.description: To make available from Defense Health Program $19,000,000 for the Defense and Veterans Brain Injury Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4883 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4883 proposed by Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S8926-8929; text: CR H8926) To make available from Defense Health Program $19,000,000 for the Defense and Veterans Brain Injury Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4883 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4883 proposed by Senator Allen.
